resources.string:
Test Your IQ with Maths 

 This is a math game that specially designed to test your mathematical skills 

 You have to guess the correct answer for the mathematical expression that diplay on screen. 

 You Just have 10 seconds for each. 


How to paly 

 It is very easy. you just have to select a level at the beginning according to your confidence about your math skills. 

 You have four levels. Novice, easy , medium and guru. pick one and you are in. 

 type the answer and hit "#" to check it. it will show the result. 

 if an mathematical expression feels difficult you can use Hint option. it will let you know whether your 

 answer is greater than or less than to the correct answer.


 you have to answer 10 questions. end of the test it will display your score for each and total score. 

 If you solve quikly you can score more! 


Enjoy The MASTERMATH!
